note.p: Scottish piper. From Clunie, Perthshire. Employed by the marchioness of Stafford (Anne Sutherland-Leveson-Gower; from 1861 the duchess of Sutherland) from at least 1851; valet to the duke of Sutherland.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1987/205/8), 1861 (RG9/45/48/10), 1881 (RG11/330/40/3)
England deaths and burials, 1538–1991 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 June 2020)
